document_data.name: Torgga
document_data.mainbody: '''Torgga''' was a [[duergar]] looter who was active on the [[Sword Coast]] region during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. For a time, she operated under the command of [[Gimblebock]].
document_data.Description: She had dark skin and white hair that she wore back in a braid.
document_data.Possessions: Torgga wore a suit of [[padded armor]] and carried with her a [[shortbow]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Torgga and the rest of Gimblebock's gang ventured into an [[Temple of Jergal (Sword Coast)|ancient crypt]] near the banks of the [[River Chionthar]]. She was among the more battle-hardened group that delved deepter into the crypt, while Gimblebock and a few of his lackeys laid claim to an [[nautiloid|alien vessel]] that crashed nearby.
